name: Boar Ferocity
descriptionText: Your flesh-ripping unarmed strikes terrify your victims.
benefitText: You add piercing damage to the damage types you can deal with your unarmed strikes. Further, you gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks to demoralize opponents.
